{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20424v1", "title": "ESPARTACO 2, a new stellar spectrograph at Uniandes", "summary": "We present the construction and early results of ESPARTACO 2, the new stellar
spectrograph built for research and education at the Astronomical Observatory
of the Universidad de los Andes in Bogot\'a, Colombia. This instrument offers
several resolutions from 20,000 in first order using a 50 $\mu$m fiber, to
100,000 in second order in the near infrared. Precise radial-velocity
measurements are made possible by simultaneous wavelength calibration. Combined
with the 40-cm Meade telescope located at our facilities, a limiting magnitude
of 6 is reached. This instrument is a considerable improvement over its
predecessor in throughput, reliability and ease.", "main_category": "astro-ph.IM", "categories": "astro-ph.IM,astro-ph.SR", "published": "2025-04-29T04:39:20Z"}
